itemDescription: Scottish community activist, politician, co-operative worker and disability activist (1898–1989)

wikipedia_page.main: Jenny Kerr Hyslop born Janet Kerr Reid (July 13, 1898 – September 13, 1989) was a Scottish community leader, co-operative worker and disability activist.

response: Unusually for co-operatives in the United Kingdom, it is not a member of Co-operatives UK. However, in its founding year of 1881, it joined the Scottish Co-operative Wholesale Society. Before the second world war, community leader Jenny Hyslop was one of the society's organisers.
